cast.name: 斯维特兰娜·库德钦科娃 Svetlana Khodchenkova
鲍丽娜·库捷波娃 Polina Kutepova
纳德兹达·伦波娃 Nadezhda Lumpova
叶夫根尼亚·博尔季洛夫斯卡娅 Evgeniya Bordzilovskaya

introduction: It's Not Her Name is about a woman Lisa who abandoned her child at birth and now twenty-three years later she obsessively tries to find her child. Lisa's search leads her to a young girl that she believes to be the one that she left at an orphanage. Lisa begins to spy on her and invades her life even though later she will find out the truth, that this is not her daughter. But, Lisa will not be able to stop being the mother figure that she has now become. And, like a ruthless wolf she will not let anything stand in her way of saving her "child". Two lonely souls that find a family in each other, one became a mother and the other a daughter. What is the price that they will have to pay for this encounter? The film explores the forces that posses people like demons making them strive towards their goal without boundaries, sometimes leaving a bloody trail behind. - by Vera Geraskina.
